nodes.text: Art Mawhinney is the illustrator of Look and Find: Journey to Star Wars: The Last Jedi and many other books in Phoenix International Publications, Inc.'s Look and Find line. For more than 40 years, Art has worked in TV animation, comic books, and children's book illustration, with properties including Sonic the Hedgehog, Rugrats, Star Wars, and a whole host of other Disney franchises. Working out of rural Wisconsin during all of this has made him a serious patron of FedEx and high-speed internet.

Art has been interested in cartoons, animation, comic books, and science fiction since he was a young child. He has studied animation at California Institute of the Arts, and earned an Art degree from the University of Wisconsin.
